thread.title: OH FRESH! Anushka To Sizzle In Allu Arjun's Sarainodu
thread.title_full: OH FRESH! Anushka To Sizzle In Allu Arjun's Sarainodu

title: OH FRESH! Anushka To Sizzle In Allu Arjun's Sarainodu
text:
Posted by: Pravallika Anjuri Published: Wednesday, October 21, 2015, 10:44 [IST] 
Looks like Anushka and Allu Arjun are the new best friends in Tollywood. We know that many of the dealings in the industry work on relations and both Anushka and Allu Arjun are known to be best at maintaining good relations with almost everyone in the industry. 
Of late, it is our Gona Ganna Reddy and Rudramadevi that are jelling along quite well. Apparently, Anushka does anything for her friends in the industry and never hesitates to take any kind of challenges for the sake of friend ship. 
No wonder she had appeared eight times on screen with her closest friend Nagarjuna till date. And now, Anushka is gearing up to sizzle in an item number for her new found bestie in the industry, Allu Arjun. 
Going by the reports, the actress will be shaking a leg with the Stylish Star in a mass number in his next outing Sarainodu , directed by Boyapati. 
Though the duo appeared together in Vedam and Rudramadevi earlier, they never paired up for a film. Meanwhile, it is Anushka, who is being appreciated for taking up a item song, when she is on the other hand doing bigger projects like Baahubali. 
There are also people who opine that this decision of the actress would keep her close to her fans, who miss her seeing in glamorous roles of late. Nevertheless, it is exciting for both Allu and Anushka fans to hear the news.
